title: 【1.5.2】【Forge】【ssp/smp】xDesserts - Alpha 1.0 甜品Mod

txt_content:
本帖最后由 jack1817 于 2013-6-22 19:03 编辑 

甜品Mod1.0版




xDesserts_5721498.jpg (27.71 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2013-6-22 09:37 上传





当前这个mod有3个甜品：
◦1 雅法蛋糕
◦2 脆皮巧克力雪糕
◦3 香草冰淇淋
 
~~名字不明~~


合成方法:
雅法蛋糕

[coca_beans][coca_beans] [coca_beans]最上那三个是可可豆

脆皮巧克力雪糕

[coca_beans] [coca_beans][coca_beans][snowball][snowball][snowball][coca_beans][coca_beans][coca_beans]
总之那染料是可可豆。

香草冰淇淋
 

[snowball] [snowball][snowball]   
香小麦~~~




作者自制的视频，是YOUTUBE视频，可能看不到。
[media=x,500,375]http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=eQu8alSP8G0[/media]


Alpha 2.0版預告!◦巧克力
◦橙色植物，啥東西= =
◦草莓
◦薄荷
◦更多冰淇淋Alpha3.0版预告！◦碎冰机（名称未决定）
◦冰淇淋生产设备
◦更多甜品

原文!

xDesserts 1.5.2 - v1.0
xDesserts is my first mod with MinecraftForge. I don't know why I posted this, as it is simple but oh well. Current this mod adds 3 desserts:


Jaffa CakeVanilla Ice-cream ConeKlondike Bar
More will be added later, along with farming for the foods!

Crafting:


Jaffa CakeCOCO BEANS - COCO BEANS - COCO BEANSWHEAT - EGG - WHEATWHEAT - WHEAT - WHEAT


Klondike BarCOCO BEANS - COCO BEANS - COCO BEANSSNOWBALL - SNOWBALL - SNOWBALLCOCO BEANS - COCO BEANS - COCO BEANS


Ice Cream ConeSNOWBALL - SNOWBALL - SNOWBALLWHEAT - WHEAT - WHEATNOTHING - WHEAT - NOTHING
Coming soon:





Version 2.0Chocolate BarOrange PlantStrawberry PlantMint PlantIce-creamConesMore Ice-CreamVersion 3.0Ice Breaker (Name Pending)Ice-cream makerMore Desserts
